row.name: Research Highlights
row.description: Highlighted research findings and scientific papers by DCEG investigators.

row.name: Linkage Newsletter
row.description: Issues of Linkage Newsletter, published by the NCI Division of Cancer Epidemiology & Genetics.

row.name: People in the News
row.description: DCEG staff members often receive scientific and professional society awards and recognition. In addition, they present their research at scientific conferences and participate in other events. Read about current DCEG people in the news below.

row.name: Fellowships & Training
row.description: Pre and postdoctoral fellows are involved in a variety of research projects throughout DCEG. Learn more about our current fellows and what they do by clicking a program or branch below.
